text: @MarioDB @realDonaldTrump @AmericanAir @iflymia Wait. You said the #coronavirus was a hoax - a ploy by the Democrats to make @realDonaldTrump look bad. I have video proof. So, which is it? Your viewers lives may depend on your answer... https://t.co/hipm4SKKYp
